para.1: Ukuze senze nayiphi na inkqubela yokwenyani kubomi bethu bokomoya siyazi ukuba sifuna iguru-umntu wokusibonisa indlela, acele umngeni, alungise, asikhokele kwaye asincede.
para.2: Singathanda ukukumema ukuba ucinge ukuba neNkosi uYesu njengoGugu wakho. INkosi uYesu yaphilisa abantu abaninzi. Akazange axoke okanye akhathaze nabani na. Wayethobekile. Akazange atshate. Wayephila ubomi obulula yaye akazange asebenzise amandla akhe ukuze azuze ubutyebi.
